eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Mobile, AL; AT 07:42 AM ON NOV 04, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:54 AM NOV 08, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Mobile Co Alert: THIS IS A TEST OF THE MOBILE COUNTY EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM.

To ensure others receive alerts, have them text "MOBILEALERT" to 226787
